ai-patthana23.53:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.53:0.3_0: for the sake of the self-developing conditions and the seventy-three territory.
ai-patthana23.53:1.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, or resentment arises in him, since he has a cause, condition for the sake of specific condition, etc., only the wrong way.
ai-patthana23.53:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.53:2.1_0: Not in regard to this, he doesn’t give rise to the insistence of his insistence, nor repulsion, insignificant conditions.
ai-patthana23.53:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.53:3.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion of insistence on being easy to admonish, and one who has no cause or condition.
